mapper.select: SELECT i.prod_lot prod_lot , p.prod_name prod_name , i.sales_in_date sales_in_date , i.sales_in_amt sales_in_amt , i.prod_save_amt prod_save_amt , i.sales_in_exd sales_in_exd FROM sales_in i JOIN com_prod p ON (i.prod_code = p.prod_code) ORDER BY prod_lot DESC

SELECT i.prod_lot prod_lot , p.prod_name prod_name , i.sales_in_date sales_in_date , i.sales_in_amt sales_in_amt , i.prod_save_amt prod_save_amt , i.sales_in_exd sales_in_exd FROM sales_in i JOIN com_prod p ON (i.prod_code = p.prod_code)
AND p.prod_code LIKE '%' || #{prodCode} || '%'
AND i.sales_in_date >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND i.sales_in_date <= TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY prod_lot DESC
SELECT prod_code, prod_name, prod_unit, prod_std FROM com_prod WHERE prod_kind = 'C' ORDER BY prod_code DESC
